title: Communication Help: Repetition (Usefulness 9)
description: Traveler usefulness 9/10 phrases for the Repetition subcategory within Communication Help. Includes 5 card(s).

cards.japanese: もう一度言ってください？
もう一度言ってください。

cards.english: What? Could you say that again?
cards.japanese: え？もう一度お願いします。
もう一度言ってください。
